briefTitle: A Non Interventional Study With Doce Onkovis (Docetaxel) Utilized for the Treatment of Cancer
officialTitle: Open, Multicenter Observational Study of Docetaxel Utilized in Mono- or Combination Therapy for Treatment of Breast Cancer, NSCLC, Prostate Carcinoma, Adenocarcinoma of Stomach and Advanced Squamous Cell Carcinoma of Head/Neck Region.
primaryOutcomeMeasure: the quantity of Doce onkovis needed pro treatment cycle
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Indication for Docetaxel according to the SmPC and treating physician

Exclusion Criteria:

* according to the Docetaxel SmPC
